revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #32 Pamtre |image = [[File:Pamtre.png]] |caption = This Berry drifted from a faraway sea. It is now cultivated in the Sinnoh region. |growtime = 5h 0m 0s |harvest = 31 berries |replant = 10% |points = 950 |flavor =
*0 spicy *30 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Pamtre''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Cornn]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of dry and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Cornn]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 50 mins || 2 hours 46 mins 40 secs || 4 hours 33 mins 20 secs || 5 hours - 10 hours |- ! Animation |

[[File:PamtreTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PamtreTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
